Package Controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Creates the Modify Product window of the application.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setProduct

      public void setProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      Takes the attributes of the selected product and fills in the text fields with that information. Also sets the index of the product so the information can be updated correctly in the Inventory.

    • OnAddButtonClicked

      public void OnAddButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Adds a selected part to the associated parts list and removes it from the local allParts list when the 'Add' button is clicked. A part must be selected before it can be associated with a product.

    • OnRemoveAssociatedPartClicked

      public void OnRemoveAssociatedPartClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Removes a selected part from the associated parts list. A part must be selected before it can be disassociated.

    • OnSaveClicked

      public void OnSaveClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Updates a product with the given information and saves it to the inventory. All fields must be filled with the proper input. User must confirm before product is saved.

    • OnCancelClicked

      public void OnCancelClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Returns the user to the Main Window when the 'Cancel' button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • GetPartSearchResults

      public void GetPartSearchResults(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Filters the part table based on a search query. The user can search by part ID or by the part name.
